data: November | Laxton | London | Beaconsfield Villas | Number Five

The fog of November in its descent upon Laxton, one of Londonâ€™s busiest suburbs, had effaced the whole of Beaconsfield Villas, including the Number Five on the fanlight over the door of the last house but two in the row.
